channel.title: NerdCraft 1.8 Survival Server Ip: NerdCraft.Org
channel.description:
|NerdCraft| ==================================================================================== NerdCraft is a dedicated server, runs 24/7, and can support 80 players at once with 4gb RAM! Our website is nerdcraft.org and a direct link to our forums is nerdcraft.org/forums
NerdCraft is an economy based survival server, and the server wide currency is Gold Ingots and/or _______. [Players; please note you are free to use anything for player to player trading]
Administrative staff on NerdCraft [Owner] Karzire [Admin] Caliber0, KingWaller, Khralen, crythorn, Dragon8186 [Mod] Rosinac, XxAtOmIcWaFlExX
*NerdCraft games =========================================================================== ~WAR~ =========================================================================== War is a plugin based on CTF[Capture the flag] and PVP.
*Official Tournament for WAR haven't been scheduled yet. But sometime soon they will start!
There is a 'War Hub' to the left of spawn next to the SkyCity skyscraper. There, you can choose which field you would like to go to, then simply walk through the gate. Once you are teliported to the field you have to pick which team you want to go on. Once your on a team you can crouch [Or sneak] to toggle which inventory you have for the battle.
There are 2 ways to win a War game. Kill your opposing team members until there life pool has run out [the set amount of times the team as a hole can die] OR by scoring points. You can score points by claiming a landmark [Obsidian platform with hole{place your teams wool in it to claim}] or by capturing the other teams flag and returning to your flag or your base. If the other team has your flag and you have thiers, you must kill the person holding your teams flag in order to score the point. The flags also respawn after being claimed so you can do this all game. [Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more] ========================================================================== ~WALLBERG BUILDING COMPITITION~ ========================================================================== How to enter:
Message KingWaller on Facebook here. or Youtube here.
*You must gather a team of 1-10 players to enter.
Object: Use own resources, build whatever KingWaller says [Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more] ========================================================================== ~SPLEEF~ ========================================================================== Object is to remove the floor from underneath your opponent. First one to fall looses.
Tournaments start at 7:00 PM CST on Tuesdays every week.
* To win the tournament you must make your way up to the championships. The championships are held in Wallberg everyweek. Other tournament games are rotated throughout all the cities. [Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more] =========================================================================== ~PVP~ =========================================================================== Object is to Survive.
BattleRoyal and 1 vs 1 tournaments are held at the same time: 7:00 PM CST on Thursdays
*Winner gets 50 gold. Winner of both BattleRoyal and 1 vs 1 championship gets 100 gold.[Winner of BattleRoyal and 1 vs 1 face eachother] [Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more] Additional Details Survival economy based server, economy is gold ingots and Zire [iconomy money]nTNT and creepers are disabled.nWe are a fun and friendly server with regulary scheduled games! Hope to see you there!

item.title: NerdCraft 1.8 Survival Server Ip: NerdCraft.Org
item.dc:creator: @bobsqeezeorg bobsqeezeorg
item.description:
@bobsqeezeorg wrote:

|NerdCraft|

NerdCraft is a dedicated server, runs 24/7, and can support 80 players at once with 4gb RAM!
Our website is nerdcraft.org and a direct link to our forums is nerdcraft.org/forums

NerdCraft is an economy based survival server, and the server wide currency is Gold Ingots and/or _______. [Players; please note you are free to use anything for player to player trading]

Administrative staff on NerdCraft
[Owner] Karzire
[Admin] Caliber0, KingWaller, Khralen, crythorn, Dragon8186
[Mod] Rosinac, XxAtOmIcWaFlExX

*NerdCraft games

~WAR~

War is a plugin based on CTF[Capture the flag] and PVP.

*Official Tournament for WAR haven’t been scheduled yet. But sometime soon they will start!

There is a ‘War Hub’ to the left of spawn next to the SkyCity skyscraper. There, you can choose which field you would like to go to, then simply walk through the gate. Once you are teliported to the field you have to pick which team you want to go on. Once your on a team you can crouch [Or sneak] to toggle which inventory you have for the battle.

There are 2 ways to win a War game. Kill your opposing team members until there life pool has run out [the set amount of times the team as a hole can die] OR by scoring points. You can score points by claiming a landmark [Obsidian platform with hole{place your teams wool in it to claim}] or by capturing the other teams flag and returning to your flag or your base. If the other team has your flag and you have thiers, you must kill the person holding your teams flag in order to score the point. The flags also respawn after being claimed so you can do this all game.
[Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more]

~WALLBERG BUILDING COMPITITION~

How to enter:

Message KingWaller on Facebook here. or Youtube here.

*You must gather a team of 1-10 players to enter.

Object: Use own resources, build whatever KingWaller says
[Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more]

~SPLEEF~

Object is to remove the floor from underneath your opponent. First one to fall looses.

Tournaments start at 7:00 PM CST on Tuesdays every week.

  • To win the tournament you must make your way up to the championships. The championships are held in Wallberg everyweek. Other tournament games are rotated throughout all the cities.
    [Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more]
    ===========================================================================
    ~PVP~
    ===========================================================================
    Object is to Survive.

BattleRoyal and 1 vs 1 tournaments are held at the same time: 7:00 PM CST on Thursdays

*Winner gets 50 gold. Winner of both BattleRoyal and 1 vs 1 championship gets 100 gold.[Winner of BattleRoyal and 1 vs 1 face eachother]
[Visit http://nerdcraft.org > Games for rules and more]
Additional Details
Survival economy based server, economy is gold ingots and Zire [iconomy money]nTNT and creepers are disabled.nWe are a fun and friendly server with regulary scheduled games! Hope to see you there!
